## Functions

### getNewSource() {#af58cbab9cb762f2d2a4baae6177e30e4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static RegSubRegPair getNewSource (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42; MRI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &#42; TII, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> Def, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/peepholeoptimizer/#ac9b69446f99357cc880c06d10601bffa">PeepholeOptimizer::RewriteMapTy</a> &amp; RewriteMap, bool HandleMultipleSources=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Given a <code>Def.Reg</code> and Def.SubReg pair, use <code>RewriteMap</code> to find the new source to use for rewrite.

If <code>HandleMultipleSources</code> is true and multiple sources for a given <code>Def</code> are found along the way, we found a PHI instructions that needs to be rewritten. TODO: HandleMultipleSources should be removed once we test PHI handling with coalescable copies.

Definition at line <a href="#l01145">1145</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/peepholeoptimizer-cpp">PeepholeOptimizer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### insertPHI() {#a8e7acd0466662074bd2486d1964cd173}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static MachineInstr &amp; insertPHI (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp; MRI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &amp; TII, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &gt; &amp; SrcRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; OrigPHI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Insert a PHI instruction with incoming edges <code>SrcRegs</code> that are guaranteed to have the same register class.

This is necessary whenever we successfully traverse a PHI instruction and find suitable sources coming from its edges. By inserting a new PHI, we provide a rewritten PHI def suitable to be used in a new COPY instruction.

Definition at line <a href="#l01109">1109</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/peepholeoptimizer-cpp">PeepholeOptimizer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Perform peephole optimizations on the machine code:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Optimize Extensions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     Optimization of sign / zero extension instructions. It may be extended to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     handle other instructions with similar properties.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     On some targets, some instructions, e.g. X86 sign / zero extension, may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     leave the source value in the lower part of the result. This optimization</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     will replace some uses of the pre-extension value with uses of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     sub-register of the results.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Optimize Comparisons</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     Optimization of comparison instructions. For instance, in this code:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       sub r1, 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       cmp r1, 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       bz  L1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     If the &quot;sub&quot; instruction all ready sets (or could be modified to set) the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     same flag that the &quot;cmp&quot; instruction sets and that &quot;bz&quot; uses, then we can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     eliminate the &quot;cmp&quot; instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     Another instance, in this code:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       sub r1, r3 | sub r1, imm</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       cmp r3, r1 or cmp r1, r3 | cmp r1, imm</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       bge L1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     If the branch instruction can use flag from &quot;sub&quot;, then we can replace</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     &quot;sub&quot; with &quot;subs&quot; and eliminate the &quot;cmp&quot; instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Optimize Loads:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     Loads that can be folded into a later instruction. A load is foldable</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     if it loads to virtual registers and the virtual register defined has</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     a single use.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Optimize Copies and Bitcast (more generally, target specific copies):</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     Rewrite copies and bitcasts to avoid cross register bank copies</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     when possible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     E.g., Consider the following example, where capital and lower</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     letters denote different register file:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     b = copy A &lt;-- cross-bank copy</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     C = copy b &lt;-- cross-bank copy</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   =&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     b = copy A &lt;-- cross-bank copy</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     C = copy A &lt;-- same-bank copy</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     E.g., for bitcast:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     b = bitcast A &lt;-- cross-bank copy</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     C = bitcast b &lt;-- cross-bank copy</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   =&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     b = bitcast A &lt;-- cross-bank copy</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     C = copy A    &lt;-- same-bank copy</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Interface to query instructions amenable to copy rewriting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a33607cdfed7a2110695c526b7520d224">Rewriter</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">protected</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> = 0; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; The index of the source being rewritten.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a33607cdfed7a2110695c526b7520d224"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a33607cdfed7a2110695c526b7520d224">Rewriter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>) : <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ad2bfa5ae4bc00ede215508c597f2e543"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ad2bfa5ae4bc00ede215508c597f2e543">~Rewriter</a>() = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Get the next rewritable source (SrcReg, SrcSubReg) and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the related value that it affects (DstReg, DstSubReg).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A source is considered rewritable if its register class and the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// register class of the related DstReg may not be register</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// coalescer friendly. In other words, given a copy-like instruction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// not all the arguments may be returned at rewritable source, since</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// some arguments are none to be register coalescer friendly.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Each call of this method moves the current source to the next</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// rewritable source.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// For instance, let CopyLike be the instruction to rewrite.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// CopyLike has one definition and one source:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// dst.dstSubIdx = CopyLike src.srcSubIdx.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The first call will give the first rewritable source, i.e.,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the only source this instruction has:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (SrcReg, SrcSubReg) = (src, srcSubIdx).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This source defines the whole definition, i.e.,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (DstReg, DstSubReg) = (dst, dstSubIdx).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The second and subsequent calls will return false, as there is only one</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// rewritable source.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\return True if a rewritable source has been found, false otherwise.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The output arguments are valid if and only if true is returned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a3fa829354b3f8b782d40175469540cab"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a3fa829354b3f8b782d40175469540cab">getNextRewritableSource</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp;Src,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">                                       <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp;Dst) = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Rewrite the current source with \\p NewReg and \\p NewSubReg if possible.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\return True if the rewriting was possible, false otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac8009fc29123ba030ea30157cf18c62d"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac8009fc29123ba030ea30157cf18c62d">RewriteCurrentSource</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> NewReg, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewSubReg) = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Specialized rewriter for INSERT&#95;SUBREG instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/insertsubregrewriter"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/insertsubregrewriter/#a8d792ce793510d7ac2ad168873579747">InsertSubregRewriter</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a33607cdfed7a2110695c526b7520d224">Rewriter</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/insertsubregrewriter/#a8d792ce793510d7ac2ad168873579747"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/insertsubregrewriter/#a8d792ce793510d7ac2ad168873579747">InsertSubregRewriter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) : <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a33607cdfed7a2110695c526b7520d224">Rewriter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isInsertSubreg() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Invalid instruction&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\see See Rewriter::getNextRewritableSource()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Here CopyLike has the following form:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// dst = INSERT&#95;SUBREG Src1, Src2.src2SubIdx, subIdx.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Src1 has the same register class has dst, hence, there is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// nothing to rewrite.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Src2.src2SubIdx, may not be register coalescer friendly.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Therefore, the first call to this method returns:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (SrcReg, SrcSubReg) = (Src2, src2SubIdx).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (DstReg, DstSubReg) = (dst, subIdx).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Subsequence calls will return false.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/regsequencerewriter"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/regsequencerewriter/#a87532e5082e8fff97e3e6b62104c244a">RegSequenceRewriter</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a33607cdfed7a2110695c526b7520d224">Rewriter</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/regsequencerewriter/#a87532e5082e8fff97e3e6b62104c244a"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/regsequencerewriter/#a87532e5082e8fff97e3e6b62104c244a">RegSequenceRewriter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) : <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a33607cdfed7a2110695c526b7520d224">Rewriter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isRegSequence() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Invalid instruction&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\see Rewriter::getNextRewritableSource()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Here CopyLike has the following form:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// dst = REG&#95;SEQUENCE Src1.src1SubIdx, subIdx1, Src2.src2SubIdx, subIdx2.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Each call will return a different source, walking all the available</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// source.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The first call returns:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (SrcReg, SrcSubReg) = (Src1, src1SubIdx).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (DstReg, DstSubReg) = (dst, subIdx1).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The second call returns:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (SrcReg, SrcSubReg) = (Src2, src2SubIdx).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (DstReg, DstSubReg) = (dst, subIdx2).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// And so on, until all the sources have been traversed, then</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// it returns false.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/regsequencerewriter/#af67bc5de34066daeefa8468bc983e737"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/regsequencerewriter/#af67bc5de34066daeefa8468bc983e737">getNextRewritableSource</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp;Src,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">                               <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp;Dst)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> override </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We are looking at v0 = REG&#95;SEQUENCE v1, sub1, v2, sub2, etc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If this is the first call, move to the first argument.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, move to the next argument and check that it is valid.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> += 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.getNumOperands())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MOInsertedReg = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.getOperand(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="normal">    Src.Reg = MOInsertedReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we have to compose sub-register indices, bail out.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((Src.SubReg = MOInsertedReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a028a8c5113d40d8c3f4427053bf36738">getSubReg</a>()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We want to track something that is compatible with the related</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// partial definition.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal">    Dst.SubReg = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.getOperand(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> + 1).getImm();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MODef = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.getOperand(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">    Dst.Reg = MODef.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(MODef.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a028a8c5113d40d8c3f4427053bf36738">getSubReg</a>() == 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;cannot have subregister def in SSA&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/regsequencerewriter/#ad1e6780b2cde967f55f56868b46c01a1"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/regsequencerewriter/#ad1e6780b2cde967f55f56868b46c01a1">RewriteCurrentSource</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> NewReg, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewSubReg)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> override </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We cannot rewrite out of bound operands.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Moreover, rewritable sources are at odd positions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> &amp; 1) != 1 || <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> &gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.getNumOperands())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.getOperand(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Helper class to hold instructions that are inside recurrence cycles.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The recurrence cycle is formulated around 1) a def operand and its</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="comment">/// tied use operand, or 2) a def operand and a use operand that is commutable</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="comment">/// with another use operand which is tied to the def operand. In the latter</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="comment">/// case, index of the tied use operand and the commutable use operand are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="comment">/// maintained with CommutePair.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/recurrenceinstr"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/recurrenceinstr/#a8a26459dfc2a52b07f2060e8a9612977">RecurrenceInstr</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/recurrenceinstr/#a9d61955fb8b5e0b1aba48359f293383e"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/recurrenceinstr/#a9d61955fb8b5e0b1aba48359f293383e">IndexPair</a> = std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/recurrenceinstr/#a8a26459dfc2a52b07f2060e8a9612977"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/recurrenceinstr/#a8a26459dfc2a52b07f2060e8a9612977">RecurrenceInstr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;MI) : MI(MI) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Helper class to track the possible sources of a value defined by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a (chain of) copy related instructions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Given a definition (instruction and definition index), this class</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><Highlight kind="comment">/// follows the use-def chain to find successive suitable sources.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The given source can be used to rewrite the definition into</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="comment">/// def = COPY src.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For instance, let us consider the following snippet:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><Highlight kind="comment">/// v0 =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><Highlight kind="comment">/// v2 = INSERT&#95;SUBREG v1, v0, sub0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><Highlight kind="comment">/// def = COPY v2.sub0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Using a ValueTracker for def = COPY v2.sub0 will give the following</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="comment">/// suitable sources:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="comment">/// v2.sub0 and v0.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Then, def can be rewritten into def = COPY v0.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/valuetracker"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/valuetracker/#a2b6a1a42542bec9018068ce22e56f1eb">ValueTracker</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The current point into the use-def chain.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;Def = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The index of the definition in Def.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DefIdx = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The sub register index of the definition.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DefSubReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The register where the value can be found.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// MachineRegisterInfo used to perform tracking.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Create a ValueTracker instance for the value defined by \\p Reg.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p DefSubReg represents the sub register index the value tracker will</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// track. It does not need to match the sub register index used in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// definition of \\p Reg.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If \\p Reg is a physical register, a value tracker constructed with</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// this constructor will not find any alternative source.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Indeed, when \\p Reg is a physical register that constructor does not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// know which definition of \\p Reg it should track.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Use the next constructor to track a physical register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/valuetracker/#a2b6a1a42542bec9018068ce22e56f1eb"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/valuetracker/#a2b6a1a42542bec9018068ce22e56f1eb">ValueTracker</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DefSubReg, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp;MRI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &#42;TII = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><Highlight kind="normal">      : DefSubReg(DefSubReg), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>), MRI(MRI), TII(TII) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><Highlight kind="normal">      Def = MRI.getVRegDef(Reg);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now replace all uses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#acdfbcf188e2d4a80837e89de2ccdffab">if</a> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><Highlight kind="normal">    SmallPtrSet&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt; PHIBBs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look for PHI uses of the extended result, we don&#39;t want to extend the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// liveness of a PHI input. It breaks all kinds of assumptions down</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// stream. A PHI use is expected to be the kill of its source values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><Highlight kind="normal">    for (MachineInstr &amp;UI : MRI-&gt;use&#95;nodbg&#95;instructions(DstReg))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><Highlight kind="normal">      if (UI.isPHI())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><Highlight kind="normal">        PHIBBs.insert(UI.getParent());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><Highlight kind="normal">    const TargetRegisterClass &#42;RC = MRI-&gt;getRegClass(SrcReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><Highlight kind="normal">    for (MachineOperand &#42;UseMO : Uses) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><Highlight kind="normal">      MachineInstr &#42;UseMI = UseMO-&gt;getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><Highlight kind="normal">      MachineBasicBlock &#42;UseMBB = UseMI-&gt;getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><Highlight kind="normal">      if (PHIBBs.count(UseMBB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><Highlight kind="normal">        continue;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// About to add uses of DstReg, clear DstReg&#39;s kill flags.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><Highlight kind="normal">      if (!Changed) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><Highlight kind="normal">        MRI-&gt;clearKillFlags(DstReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><Highlight kind="normal">        MRI-&gt;constrainRegClass(DstReg, DstRC);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SubReg defs are illegal in machine SSA phase,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we should not generate SubReg defs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For example, for the instructions:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %1:g8rc&#95;and&#95;g8rc&#95;nox0 = EXTSW %0:g8rc</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %3:gprc&#95;and&#95;gprc&#95;nor0 = COPY %0.sub&#95;32:g8rc</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We should generate:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %1:g8rc&#95;and&#95;g8rc&#95;nox0 = EXTSW %0:g8rc</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %6:gprc&#95;and&#95;gprc&#95;nor0 = COPY %1.sub&#95;32:g8rc&#95;and&#95;g8rc&#95;nox0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %3:gprc&#95;and&#95;gprc&#95;nor0 = COPY %6:gprc&#95;and&#95;gprc&#95;nor0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><Highlight kind="normal">      if (UseSrcSubIdx)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><Highlight kind="normal">        RC = MRI-&gt;getRegClass(UseMI-&gt;getOperand(0).getReg());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><Highlight kind="normal">      Register NewVR = MRI-&gt;createVirtualRegister(RC);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><Highlight kind="normal">      BuildMI(&#42;UseMBB, UseMI, UseMI-&gt;getDebugLoc(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><Highlight kind="normal">              TII-&gt;get(TargetOpcode::COPY), NewVR)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><Highlight kind="normal">          .addReg(DstReg, 0, SubIdx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><Highlight kind="normal">      if (UseSrcSubIdx)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><Highlight kind="normal">        UseMO-&gt;setSubReg(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><Highlight kind="normal">      UseMO-&gt;setReg(NewVR);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++NumReuse;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><Highlight kind="normal">      Changed = true;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Try to find the next source that share the same register file</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for the value defined by \\p Reg and \\p SubReg.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><Highlight kind="comment">/// When true is returned, the \\p RewriteMap can be used by the client to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><Highlight kind="comment">/// retrieve all Def -&gt; Use along the way up to the next source. Any found</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Use that is not itself a key for another entry, is the next source to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><Highlight kind="comment">/// use. During the search for the next source, multiple sources can be found</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><Highlight kind="comment">/// given multiple incoming sources of a PHI instruction. In this case, we</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><Highlight kind="comment">/// look in each PHI source for the next source; all found next sources must</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><Highlight kind="comment">/// share the same register file as \\p Reg and \\p SubReg. The client should</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><Highlight kind="comment">/// then be capable to rewrite all intermediate PHIs to get the next source.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\return False if no alternative sources are available. True otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PeepholeOptimizer::findNextSource(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> RegSubReg,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"><Highlight kind="normal">                                       RewriteMapTy &amp;RewriteMap) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do not try to find a new source for a physical register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// So far we do not have any motivating example for doing that.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Thus, instead of maintaining untested code, we will revisit that if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that changes at some point.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = RegSubReg.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetinstrinfo/regsubregpair/#aad7e848e562b1368d6ee4794d84957c6">Reg</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>.isPhysical())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Follow the chain of copies until we find a more suitable source, a phi</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// or have to abort.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/valuetrackerresult/#ae5abded57b308757f3a593284dcdab5c">ValueTrackerResult</a> CurSrcRes = RewriteMap.lookup(CurSrcPair);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An existent entry with multiple sources is a PHI cycle we must avoid.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Insert a PHI instruction with incoming edges \\p SrcRegs that are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><Highlight kind="comment">/// guaranteed to have the same register class. This is necessary whenever we</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><Highlight kind="comment">/// suitable to be used in a new COPY instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Optimize generic copy instructions to avoid cross register bank copy.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The optimization looks through a chain of copies and tries to find a source</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that has a compatible register class.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Two register classes are considered to be compatible if they share the same</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><Highlight kind="comment">/// register bank.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><Highlight kind="comment">/// New copies issued by this optimization are register allocator</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><Highlight kind="comment">/// friendly. This optimization does not remove any copy as it may</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><Highlight kind="comment">/// overconstrain the register allocator, but replaces some operands</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><Highlight kind="comment">/// when possible.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\pre isCoalescableCopy(&#42;MI) is true.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\return True, when \\p MI has been rewritten. False otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PeepholeOptimizer::optimizeCoalescableCopy(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1305"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1306"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Optimize copy-like instructions to create</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1307"><Highlight kind="comment">/// register coalescer friendly instruction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1308"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The optimization tries to kill-off the \\p MI by looking</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1309"><Highlight kind="comment">/// through a chain of copies to find a source that has a compatible</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1310"><Highlight kind="comment">/// register class.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1311"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If such a source is found, it replace \\p MI by a generic COPY</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1312"><Highlight kind="comment">/// operation.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\pre isUncoalescableCopy(&#42;MI) is true.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\return True, when \\p MI has been optimized. In that case, \\p MI has</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><Highlight kind="comment">/// been removed from its parent.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><Highlight kind="comment">/// All COPY instructions created, are inserted in \\p LocalMIs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1317"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PeepholeOptimizer::optimizeUncoalescableCopy(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1318"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;MachineInstr &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;LocalMIs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(isUncoalescableCopy(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Invalid argument&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1320"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/uncoalescablerewriter/#ac508181ecb468aa9a608f61223e92413">UncoalescableRewriter</a> CpyRewriter(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1321"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Rewrite each rewritable source by generating new COPYs. This works</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// differently from optimizeCoalescableCopy since it first makes sure that all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// definitions can be rewritten.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><Highlight kind="normal">  RewriteMapTy RewriteMap;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1593"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
